bill.summary:
Contingency Operation Waste and Fraud Prevention Act of 2018
This bill establishes the position of Senior Anticorruption Officer in the Department of State, the U.S. Agency for International Development, and the Department of Defense to combat corruption in programs, projects, or activities associated with a military operation. It also establishes a Working Group for Anticorruption to, among other things, develop and implement an interagency anticorruption strategy for such operations.
